definition: to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: After years of collecting, he has stored up lots of rare treasures.
sentences.chinese: 經過多年的收集，他已經祕藏了很多稀世的珍寶。

sentences.english: The police raided the house and uncovered a cache of weapons.
sentences.chinese: 警方突然搜查這幢房子，發現了祕藏的武器。

sentences.english: Think of them as children playing hide and seek, hoping and waiting to be discovered.
sentences.chinese: 將記憶看做是在捉祕藏希望等待被發現的孩子。

sentences.english: Beijing is a city of hidden treasures.
sentences.chinese: 北京是一座富有祕藏的城市。
